pullRequest.title: Move utilties from Util.java to localized places
pullRequest.bodyText:
'Util.java' is too gereric, this update moves methods
that are used in just one or two places to be localized
to those locations.

Testing

Screens Shots

Additional Notes to Reviewer

This update only moves code.
Release Note

commit.message:
Move utilties from Util.java to localized places

'Util.java' is too gereric, this update moves methods
that are used in just one or two places to be localized
to those locations.

nodes.bodyText: Method findTerritoryName has a Cognitive Complexity of 11 (exceeds 7 allowed). Consider refactoring.
